Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Really enjoyed our dinner here. Beautiful lamb and chicken 50 euro for two was reasonable. Very helpful German waiter and enjoyed the crackers and rum on the house.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Great place, amazing food. I really recommend this restaurant if you want to eat some proper, authentic Indonesian food. Chose one of the mocktails, they're a good combination with the food. Shared dining is the concept. Price quality level is great!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: The best satay ayam I have ever had! I also loved the fried squid and gado gado. Over all, very good food, very friendly staff and very nice atmosphere!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: One of the best Indonesian restaurant I‚Äôve been in Amsterdam! The sea bass in banana leaf, rendang, and Dadar gulung are my favourites and they are amazing. As an Indonesian myself, i would highly recommend Cafe AMOI. It‚Äôs not like a typical Indonesian restaurant in NL.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: üëåüëåüëåthis was one of the first nice restaurants we found while in Amsterdam. Indonesian food really is a special part of the Netherlands and cafe amoi does it really really well. I find in Amsterdam it‚Äôs hard to find good food with flavour ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Amazing place! The food is amazing, the design is very interesting and cosy. The staff is super friendly and helpful. I would definitely come back!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Nicely decorated restaurant with delicious food at a reasonable price.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text:
Nice atmosphere, helpful friendly stuff.
We tried many food, I felt some of them were pre-cooked ( this is very common in Asian restaurants in NL).  I don't think I will visit again.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Best meal I've had in Amsterdam. Fantastic dishes with a variety of flavors. Beautiful restaurant

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Great place for dinner. I have been here few times and look forward to going again.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Great service, food and cocktails! Really nice atmosphere as well!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Delicious Indonesian food, great service and really cool atmosphere. Prices were very reasonable for the quality and taste. We had an amazing dinner and would highly recommend checking it out. Keep in mind you may need reservations. We went ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Really like this restaurant! It is hard to find a good Indonesian restaurant besides the tokos. The atmosphere is very good and relaxed. The food is very well prepared and really tasteful. And the staff is fun and friendly. We had a great night thanks to them, thank you! :)

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Great interior style, friendly service, fantasy cocktails and incredible food. The sea bass in banana leaf was delicious as was the beef and curried veg. One of the best places we are in Amsterdam.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Overall atmosphere and interior design is great. Food was decent but not the best Indonesian ive had. Could use a bit more flavouring in some of their dishes but overall I'd say worth a visit. Their floral ginger and orange lemonade was a surprise! Would recommend! Not too sweet but super refreshing. Service was great.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: I have eaten here twice so far and I can truly say that this place is a lovely little hidden gem in Amsterdam West. You could easily pass the entrance without knowing. The food is terrific Indonesian cuisine packed with flavours you'll ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Best Indonesian food I have had. Been to a few places around Amsterdam, Bonaire, Bali, and Seattle. This place is great! So many great dishes to share. Wonderful flavors, great drinks, great service, lively atmosphere. Seattle needs a good Indonesian restaurant badly. Please save us and come open one over here!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Fantastic address for a delicious Indonesian restaurant in a modern setting. Delicious dishes - quite spicy and full of flavors - thoughtful service, Gin Kepala cocktail is a killer. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Even the mild dishes were quite spicy, which I guess can be nice if you are into this sort of thing. They serve tap water, which is great if you are not tolerant to this level of spicy. Nevertheless, really tasty. Good cocktails too!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: We went there with friends on a Friday, and it was great because originally we booked spots at the bar, but when we arrived they were able to sit us at a table. The service was fast and friendly. The place is quite big and the vibe is very ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Indonesian place with very nice interior design. Made a reservation for a Friday eve and when I got there the place was packed, as it usually happens in Amsterdam. Waiters were fast in taking us to our table, which was in one of the darkest ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Food and drinks are delicious but service is extremely slow and not very attentive. I've come here several times in hopes for better service to match the excellent food but have been disappointed yet again. It took over an hour and a half ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Amazing authentic Indonesian food. The nasi kuning was perfect, the pepesan very soft, the kambing really tasty

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: If you want to have date night with your lover  or just a fun dinner with your (vegan) friends, this is the place to be! Best thing is to call ahead and check if they‚Äôre not fully booked. I have been here twice a month for the past couple ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text:
Food is so delicious !
I ordered and everything was fresh, warm and tasty ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Very tasty Indonesian food! They have tapas style sharing menu. Everything was tasty with a very reasonable price.  The service was fast and friendly but not very attentive. It took a while everyone to get attention from the staff.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: One of the best Indonesian restaurant in Amsterdam. You won't regret it. It tastes so Indonesian. It is located not too far from the city center. I recommend you to come and try Indonesian foods here. YUMMY!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: When you walk in you feel like you walk into a scene from a holiday. The walls are tastefully decorated with plants and tropical attributes. The food is very tasty and done just right. We had a dish which was a spicy fish which is not for ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Very nice place! Beautiful modern interior with an Asian twist. Friendly service. The food works with a shared dining concept and pretty much everything was delicious and enough to share. Recommend making a reservation ahead of time.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Great food but after one hour they realized they forgot our order, since we were a group and had our drinks, at first we didn't realize it... then there were no more white rice...then the lamb came cold, then they forgot one dish that we ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: The food is completely delicious here and the staff are very friendly. We went on a weekday and it wasn‚Äôt very busy so were seated quickly. We got a mixture small plates, veggie and meat and shared. The spicy beef was superb!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Tasty food, cool atmosphere, friendly staff. Super lovely evening

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: We had 4 mains and 2 starters to share beteende the two of us and everything tasted delicious. The lamb skewers and the vegetarian dishes stood out. Excellent service and value for money.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Restaurant with great taste of Indonesian food and drinks... very recommended! The staffs are also very nice and attentive, and they spell the food correctly in bahasa language. In the afternoon between 5 to 9pm are busy hours, suggest to make a reservation

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: I decided to go to the restaurant based on the very good reviews I found online and was expecting to be brought straight to Indonesia with dishes full of subtle flavours. Instead I was served pretty plain food with nothing exciting about ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: One of the best Indonesian in town! I recommend lumpia with duck and vegetarian, yellow rice (lemon in it) and the beef with spices and lime. We tried also the veggies in coconut sauce but is not great so I don‚Äôt recommend it.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Lovely restaurant! Nice place with a good atmosphere. Food was absolutely delicious - highly recommend the udang blado and the daging rendang, both were really really nice. Staff were friendly but the service wasn't great, they were pretty ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Friends told me about this place and I didn't quite know what to expect, but the food was great and I recommend it highly. It's best to just order a few different dishes and share them. Make a reservation even on weekdays since it can get really busy.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text:
Great disappointment.  :(
I was planning to come to AMOI a long long time ago, as it looked so cozy and nice from the outside. Not even close to what I thought! ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Aweful service. Our plated arrived as we were still thinking of what to order for food meanwhile ordering the drinks first with the waitress at our table (we booked via supriseat). I wanted fish but received meat, and I said what I wanted ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text:
The Rendang is out of this world,
They even have terraces...
THE place to go on a sunny day if you ask me.
Try it with a Bintang, it's a trip, I'll tell you that much....

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Super nice food and good atmosphere. Hip & cozy. Nice small dishes, good vegetarian options as well. However, suuuper stinky and strong fryer smell coming from the kitchen, had to wash my coat & even bag... #ohwell

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Everything was very delicious! Friendly staff and nice interior.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Tasty food and really lovely, helpful staff. Definitely a recommondation!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Some of the best indonesian food I've had, and have spent three weeks there. Well worth a visit, great service and good value

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Besides the cozy cool design and great location of this restaurant, the indonesian food tastes delicious. I have tried many tokos in Amsterdam, this for sure is one of the best, thanks to the lovely ladies in the kitchen and the friendly waiters.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Nice place, good service and food, price quality also good. The menu was a surprise (won't tell here!), but it's a nice place for 4-8 people, drinks and dinner.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Nice Indonesian restaurant. Many choices of food to share. Specialities are not very spiced. I recommend to spend time with friends or to discover Indonesian food.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: First experience of Indonesian cuisine- and thoroughly enjoyed. Clean, intimate interior, friendly staff, attractive menu, swift service and good food that didn't disappoint .

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Great food, comfortable atmosphere, and lovely staff. One of the more authentic Indonesian foods in Amsterdam. Would defiently come back.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Great food and friendly staff!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Nice restaurant  in Amsterdam, good  service ,food comes  in small plates ,some very good   some not so ,but overall  most were  good  ,the Indonesian  beer went well with the food.Desert was  a bit stodgy  ie fried bananas, felt it should  have been served  with  cream  or ice cream.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Nice little cosy Indonesian restaurant. Good place to go with friends and discover many dishes to share. Staff are friendly and bubbly.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: amazing place to eat and lovely friendly staff. great vegan options and reasonable prices too. would recommend

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: For those who are seeking for Indonesian cuisine in Amsterdam, Caf√© Amoi is one of the best Indonesian restaurant to go to. My favorite meal is "Gado-gado" the traditional of Indonesian mixed of vegetables salad with peanut sauce. Lekker!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Traditional Indonesian food in a vibrant location, lots of great drinks to go with any ocassion!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Had such a nice meal here. The staff was so friendly and the food was amazing. Highly recommend!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Amazing food at decent prices. Worth a wander in the rain!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Good service, nice atmosphere, good food ü•ò

Review Text:

Review Text: A beautyful place. Very good quality and taste. Very friendly staff. Prices are value for money.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Tofu omelette is very good! All the small dishes are good to share with friends. Good combination they have!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: One of my fave Indonesian places in Amsterdam. Little bites but order slowly. They come out fast and at the same time!

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: By far the best food I ate in Amsterdam. The peanut sauce was absolutely unbelievable, and our waitress was wonderful.

Name: Cafe Amoi

Review Text: I ordered some rendang on Deliveroo.nl and the food came quite warm, in a good portion and it was delicious.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Good food, slow service. It takes 2 years between taking the order to bring it to your table.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Really good food, beautiful restaurant, very nice and quick service.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Food is good but service is poor and the experience is not the traditional 'rijst tafel'. Also pricey for portions.

Name: Cafe Amoi
Review Text: Very helpful staff and lovely food. We stumbled across this place in search of a takeaway and it ended up being great
